results.title: Comparative cardioprotective effects and mechanisms of vitamin E and lisinopril against ischemic reperfusion induced cardiac toxicity.
results.text_hl: Comparative cardioprotective effects and mechanisms of @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_E @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014810 @@@vitamin E@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ reperfusion induced @DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiac toxicity@@@.

citations.NLM: Mohanty IR, Arya DS, Dinda A, Gupta SK. Comparative cardioprotective effects and mechanisms of vitamin E and lisinopril against ischemic reperfusion induced cardiac toxicity. Environ Toxicol Pharmacol. 2013 Mar;35(2):207-17. PMID: 23328120

results.title: [Clinico-metabolic and anti-ischemic effects of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril and its role in the process of left ventricular remodeling in patients with diabetic heart].

results.title: Study of the protective effect of ischemic and pharmacological preconditioning on hepatic ischemic reperfusion injury induced in rats
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@Verapamil@@@ showed the most significant improvement compared with @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ preconditioning or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Osman AS, Osman AH, Kamel MM. Study of the protective effect of ischemic and pharmacological preconditioning on hepatic ischemic reperfusion injury induced in rats JGH Open. 2017 Nov;1(3):105-111. PMID: 30483545

results.title: Enalapril in experimental hypertension and acute heart failure: comparison with calcium channel blockers.
results.text_hl: The hemodynamic effects of @CHEMICAL_Enalaprilat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015773 @@@enalaprilat@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Enalaprilat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015773 @@@MK-422@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@MK-521@@@) were compared with the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ channel blocker @CHEMICAL_Felodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015736 @@@felodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9615 @@@dogs@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@left ventricular (LV) failure@@@.

citations.NLM: Sweet CS, Ludden CT, Adkins E, Seymour AA, Emmert S, Ribeiro LG. Enalapril in experimental hypertension and acute heart failure: comparison with calcium channel blockers. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1986;8 Suppl 1():S15-9. PMID: 2422487
